revision.text:
<!--단체_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Organisation
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty =foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 약칭 | ontologyProperty = abbreviation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 표어 | ontologyProperty = motto }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 결성 | ontologyProperty = formationDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 결성 | ontologyProperty = formationYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해산 | ontologyProperty = extinctionDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해산 | ontologyProperty = extinctionYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 유형 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 형태 | ontologyProperty = status }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 목적 | ontologyProperty = purpose }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본부 | ontologyProperty = headquarter }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 활동지역 | ontologyProperty = regionServed }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 회원 | ontologyProperty = membership }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수장명칭 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 현재수장 | ontologyProperty = personName }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요기관 | ontologyProperty = mainOrgan }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 모기관 | ontologyProperty = parentOrganisation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 직원수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfStaff }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 예산 | ontologyProperty = budget | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty =foaf:homepage }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 제휴기관       =
-->
